ygData.subject: Re: Dark Elf SK
ygData.msgSnippet: The EQliser page says they have 1 charge? What about the mugs you get off the Guards in Oggok.. They are +10 char, mugs... They say 1 charge too... Does that
ygData.messageBody:
The EQliser page says they have 1 charge?
What about the mugs you get off the Guards in Oggok.. They are +10 char, mugs... They say 1 charge too... Does that mean unlimited?? If not how u recharge them?

Later
Chris
Remlin Ryal, Warlord of House Ryal
Rallos Zek

-----Original Message-----
From: Howard Chan <hchan@...>
To: eq_shadowknights@onelist.com <eq_shadowknights@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, June 17, 1999 3:53 AM
Subject: Re: [eq_shadowknights] Dark Elf SK


The Jboots has unlimited charges.
-----Original Message-----

Chris
